amendment.description: To provide additional funds for the Middle Rio Grande, New Mexico project, and for the Lake Tahoe Regional Wetlands Development project.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1667 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1667 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S11531; text: CR S11531) To provide additional funds for the Middle Rio Grande, New Mexico project, and for the Lake Tahoe Regional Wetlands Development project.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1667 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1667 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Domenici.
